alert.note: Alert for Dukes (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued August 01 at 2:30PM EDT until August 02 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Less than one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (2.7 to 3.4 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Dukes MA County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 2 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Some water on the most vulnerable low lying roads and property, especially near Edgartown Harbor, but probably not enough to impact travel. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Vineyard Haven MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/11 AM 2.2/ 2.7 0.2/ 0.7 0.5/ 1.0 1 None 02/12 AM 2.5/ 3.0 0.5/ 1.0 0.4/ 0.9 1-2 None 02/12 PM 2.2/ 2.7 0.2/ 0.8 0.5/ 1.0 1 None 03/01 AM 2.5/ 3.0 0.5/ 1.0 0.4/ 0.9 1 None 03/01 PM 2.3/ 2.8 0.4/ 0.9 0.5/ 1.0 1 None 04/02 AM 2.5/ 3.0 0.5/ 1.0 0.4/ 0.9 2 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
